title: Nintendo needs to start releasing games for the computer
body:
Laptop + HDMI cable + controllers = the way the of the future.

Who wants to buy a $300 device to play a $30 game? Also, consoles aren't going to last. If they don't get in the market, they'll just die off.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eY-3VYoEkPY
